Header.name: Andres Felipe Ospina Gualteros
Header.Profile: Full Stack Developer with a passion for blockchain technology, committed to developing innovative solutions and staying up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in the industry.

data.jobDescription:
Develop and maintain trading tools using Python and React.
Optimize code and improve performance to ensure timely processing of data.
Lead a team of developers on project development, providing guidance and mentorship.
Ensure adherence to best practices in software development, including code review, testing, and documentation.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and solve technical challenges.

- Worked on a marketplace application using React, Django, and Node.js
- Followed and took requirements from stakeholders to build a scalable and reliable application
- Set up pipelines for continuous integration using Jenkins to ensure streamlined and efficient development process
- Worked with the development team to implement best practices and ensure high-quality code delivery
- Maintained and updated the application as required

As a member of a research group focused on blockchain technology, the opportunity to contribute to several exciting projects was presented. One of the key responsibilities involved the creation of mocks for use cases and implementations in Hyperledger, Multichain, and Solidity. The work provided valuable experience in blockchain technology, and several innovative projects were developed as a result. Collaboration with a talented team of researchers and developers was also an essential aspect of this work
